title: Talon or Swain?
body: I am torn to choose between the two as they both look like such viable midlaners so i need the communities help! Which one should I buy?

talon is more simple

If u  are low elo bronze/silver Talon, if you are medium elo Talon, if you are higher elo plat 3+ swain may be a decent champ to learn and pick up. 

Talon is good in a lot of scenarios, but you lack ap damage, so try and get an AP top or jungle, or a hybrid type team. 

Jax top
Shyvana jungle
Corki adc
Morg supp
Talon mid

Swain belongs in higher elo imo for a reason, it takes practice farming with him, and also learning how to lane better, you can get ahead as Swain but he can easily be shut down through jungle ganks and mobile mid laners which can tear through him before he finishes RoA + Zhonyas, or even while it is stacking. He needs to be able to effectively coordinate with his team due to his bad roaming because of a lack of wave clear, roaming assassins and being 100-0 by an Assasin like Fizz is (if you aren't cautious) is his biggest downfall. If you can survive and get some items (RoA, Zhonyas, Sorcs, D cap) you should be fairly set. 
If they don't try to 100-0 you with jungler and let you harass, you should be fairly safe, unless they are using fizz or something.

This basically covers it all. Talon carries insanely hard at low elo, especially since most games are decided during the laning phase and mid game. If you see a Talon in bronze/silver, they almost always carry the game. Swain's a better pick at high elo imo, but that's dependent that you get the support from your team and they know what they are doing - more of a situational pick.

Swain has shtty wave clear as Dota2 said, and Talon does have better wave clear (needs 1 ability to wipe out a wave) but that's not the only thing you should consider...

Talon can insta burst champions but Swain is a beast in extended team fights...plus, Swain's damage has got slightly higher scalings than average across the AP casters and he has some nice CC which will help your jungler gank you. Your ult makes you practically unkillable, but also taunts heal reduction on yourself. So yeah.
